item.title: Google Maps Flutter Crash on Android
item.description: Fixing google_maps_flutter Crash on Android If you’ve encountered crashes while using the google_maps_flutter package on Android, you’re not alone. This issue can be quite frustrating, but fortunately, there’s a solution. In this guide, I’ll walk you through the steps to resolve the problem and get your Google Maps functionality working smoothly on Android. The Problem The google_maps_flutter package is a popular choice for integrating Google Maps into your Flutter application. However, some users have reported crashes specifically on Android devices when using this package.
